title: Wawt's on Full
description: In WAWT'S on FULL, WAWT, the main character, learns how children feel when they have had too much stress in their lives as a result of death and illness. WAWT learns that kids deal with more than just fun and games. This interactive book encourages children to use their imagination to draw or write their own words to create their own story.
author: M.H. Ackerman
